scripts.test-e2e-a: Special case for this test. We need to run bazel from within the WORKSPACE to ensure that the preserve_symlinks setting is honored.
cd internal/e2e/node_loader_no_preserve_symlinks && bazel run @nodejs//:yarn && bazel test ... && bazel test @node_resolve_dep//:test
scripts.test-e2e-b: Special case for this test. We need to run bazel from within the WORKSPACE to ensure that the preserve_symlinks setting is honored.
cd internal/e2e/node_loader_preserve_symlinks && bazel run @nodejs//:yarn && bazel test ... && bazel test @node_resolve_dep//:test
scripts.buildifier: find . -type f \( -name BUILD -or -name BUILD.bazel \) ! -path "*/node_modules/*" | xargs $(bazel info bazel-bin)/external/com_github_bazelbuild_buildtools/buildifier/*/buildifier
